original_title: Sri Lanka rupee at 306.30/50 against the US dollar, bond yields steady
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened at 306.30/50 against the US dollar in the spot market on Monday, dealers said while bonds yields were steady.
A bond maturing on 01.09.2027 was quoted at 26.40/50 percent steady from 26.40/55 percent, at Friday’s close.
The rupee opened at 306.30/50 against the US dollar in the spot market slightly stronger from 306.50/307.20 on Friday. (Colombo/May22/2023)
